executable.title: Random generator for schemes
executable.description:
Random generator for multi-shell schemes.
\ Examples: 
\ SamplingSchemeQSpaceRandomEstimation grad.txt --numberOfSamples 60 
\ SamplingSchemeQSpaceRandomEstimation grad.txt --numberOfSamples 28,28,28 
\ Reference: 
\ Jian Cheng, Dinggang Shen, Pew-Thian Yap, Peter J. Basser, "Single- and Multiple-Shell Uniform Sampling Schemes for Diffusion MRI Using Spherical Codes", IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging (TMI), 2017.
